verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036><s%> said unto <S%G4314><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G418><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> that occasions of stumbling <S%G4625><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto him <S%G1223><s%>, through whom <S%G3739><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%>!
